QuestData.Title: Skull Rock
QuestData.Description: $n. The Burning Blade has infested the cave east of Orgrimmar known as Skull Rock. Inside that cave they perform vile rituals, and burn their own flesh with Searing Collars.$B$BBy wearing these collars, I believe the cultists attune themselves to demonic power. But to confirm this, I must have a collection of the collars to study.$B$BGo to Skull Rock and gather Searing Collars from the cultists you find there. Bring them to me, and I will uncover their secrets.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 6 Searing Collars from the cultists in Skull Rock.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you yet entered Skull Rock, $n? Do you have the Searing Collars?
QuestData.RewardText: Good. Hiding within these collars is the secret behind the Burning Blade. And I will uncover that secret...
